paper_abstract: A flexible and computationally efficient method for spectral analysis of sinusoidal signals using the Basis Pursuit De-Noising (BPDN) is proposed. This method estimates a slotted Auto-Correlation Function (ACF) and computes the spectrum as the sparse representation of the ACF in a dictionary of cosine functions. Simulation results illustrate flexibility and effectiveness of the proposed method.
paper_title: Spectrum Estimation by Sparse Representation of Autocorrelation Function
